languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}В бытность архидиаконом{/d} вы разбирали и более щепетильные религиозные споры. Кардинал признался в намерении убить великого праведника, и вам этого достаточно для твердого вердикта.{/n}

{n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}В бытность архидиаконом{/d} вы разбирали и более щепетильные религиозные споры. Кардинал признался в намерении убить великого праведника, и вам этого достаточно для твердого вердикта.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

{n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

{n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In deinen Tagen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}als {mf|Erzdiakon|Erzdiakonin}{/d} hast du weitaus kniffligere religiöse Dispute als diesen geschlichtet. Der Kardial hat zugegeben, dass er einen großen und rechtschaffenen Mann töten wollte, und das ist für dich ausreichend, ein endgültiges Urteil zu fällen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In deinen Tagen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}als {mf|Erzdiakon|Erzdiakonin}{/d} hast du weitaus kniffligere religiöse Dispute als diesen geschlichtet. Der Kardial hat zugegeben, dass er einen großen und rechtschaffenen Mann töten wollte, und das ist für dich ausreichend, ein endgültiges Urteil zu fällen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsque vous étiez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}archidiacre{/d}, vous avez résolu des conflits religieux bien plus épineux. Le cardinal a admis vouloir tuer un homme remarquable et juste. Cela suffit amplement pour que vous rendiez votre jugement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque vous étiez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}archidiacre{/d}, vous avez résolu des conflits religieux bien plus épineux. Le cardinal a admis vouloir tuer un homme remarquable et juste. Cela suffit amplement pour que vous rendiez votre jugement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}担任国教高阶执事{/d}的日子里，你曾处理过比这危险得多的宗教纠纷案件。那位红衣主教已经公然承认打算杀害一位伟大、正直的人，这样的供认已经足够让你做出决定性的判决。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}担任国教高阶执事{/d}的日子里，你曾处理过比这危险得多的宗教纠纷案件。那位红衣主教已经公然承认打算杀害一位伟大、正直的人，这样的供认已经足够让你做出决定性的判决。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En tus días de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}archidiácon{mf|o|a}{/d}, resolviste disputas religiosas mucho más complejas que esta. El cardenal ha admitido que quiere matar a un hombre justo y bueno, lo que basta para que dictes una sentencia decisiva.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En tus días de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}archidiácon{mf|o|a}{/d}, resolviste disputas religiosas mucho más complejas que esta. El cardenal ha admitido que quiere matar a un hombre justo y bueno, lo que basta para que dictes una sentencia decisiva.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}アークディーコンとして仕えていた{/d}日々には、これよりはるかに危うい宗教的争いを解決してきた。枢機卿は、偉大で正しき人物を殺す意図があったことを認めている。それだけであなたが決定的な判決を下すには十分だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}アークディーコンとして仕えていた{/d}日々には、これよりはるかに危うい宗教的争いを解決してきた。枢機卿は、偉大で正しき人物を殺す意図があったことを認めている。それだけであなたが決定的な判決を下すには十分だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Bir başdiyakoz olarak{/d} hizmet ettiğin günlerde bundan çok daha riskli dinî ihtilafları çözmüştün. Kardinal, yüce ve erdemli bir adamı öldürme niyetini itiraf etti. Hüküm vermen için bu kadarı yeter de artar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your days {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}serving as an archdeacon{/d}, you resolved far more precarious religious disputes than this. The cardinal has admitted to his intention of killing a great and righteous man, and that is enough for you to render a decisive verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Bir başdiyakoz olarak{/d} hizmet ettiğin günlerde bundan çok daha riskli dini ihtilafları çözdün. Kardinal, yüce ve erdemli bir adamı öldürme niyetini itiraf etti. Hüküm vermen için bu kadarı yeter de artar.{/n}
